overview: Gwendoline and the Bethel kids is an energetic sing-along DVD with vibrant spiritual hits for kids between the ages of 2 and 10 years . All children are the target market recognizes that many parents long after their children have stopped listening , still merrily singing along ! The songs include Peace in Jerusalem ( Gwendoline 's personal favorite ) , Tomorrow Father , The Lord is my Shepherd , I saw a new heaven and this is the day .  But who is the Bethel kids ? " Bethel " means " house of God " . When you have Jesus in your heart, invite , your body becomes a house or temple of God , a Bethel . So every child whose heart Jesus remains a Bethel -kid . So yes , they come up with me , but that each time the children in the audience I was with my on stage invite . There is not a specific group who were with me on tour . "
title: Gwendoline en die Bet-El-kids
